name: Anxious
description: Feeling worried, nervous, or uneasy about something with an uncertain outcome.

name: Energized
description: Feeling full of energy and enthusiasm.

name: Tired
description: Feeling in need of rest or sleep; fatigued.

name: Overwhelmed
description: Feeling buried or overcome by too many things to deal with.

name: Inspired
description: Feeling mentally stimulated to do or feel something creative.
